Title: Wanted: Temporal Spyglass
Description:
<The posted sign is written in beautiful calligraphy.>

The archivists humbly request that all expedition members seek out the Temporal Spyglass for our artifact archives.

If acquired, please deliver to Cataloger Jakes for processing and compensation.

Expedition members have reported overhearing a dwarf bragging about his magical spyglass in the inns of Southern Thaldraszus. We recommend focusing your search in that region.
PortraitGiverText: A primalist lookout in Thaldraszus uses the Temporal Spyglass to plot his next attack.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Cataloger Jakes in the Dragonscale Basecamp.
